'''"Sales Savvy 101"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Sales Savvy 101" is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=240}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Birch Wood = 8
|Iron Chunk = 4
|White Iron Chunk = 4
|sort = Birch Wood;Iron Chunk;White Iron Chunk
}}
